name: Evolserk
description:
The final battle of broken Evolvaces has begun.
　On-line showdown RTS game.

　Synchronized twin collision judging system enables you to play high-speed on-line showdown without feeling communication delay.

　Turns switch every 5 secs. The speedy and tense showdown.
　Easy operation, only set up and move weapons.
　Automatic attacking.
　Use Evolvace's hyper attacks.

　Will it be the last time of Evolvaces??
　What is the unexpected Evolserk's identity??
